abstract: Obama administration says it will step up enforcement of laws that require equal insurance coverage for mental and physical illnesses, which is intended to help address opioid overdose epidemic.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The move, intended to help fight opioid addiction, forces insurers to provide coverage for drug treatment that is comparable to that for any other medical condition.
snippet: The move, intended to help fight opioid addiction, forces insurers to provide coverage for drug treatment that is comparable to that for any other medical condition....

headline.main: U.S. Enforcing Insurance Law to Help Fight Opioid Abuse
headline.print_headline: U.S. Enforcing Insurance Law to Help Fight Opioid Abuse
